$interpreted: Naya: Angel, the monsters don't seem to be chasing us!
Angelia: So they are indeed attracted to that tree?

Naya: However, we must still be careful. Theodore's forces are stationed nearby. 
They may have already noticed the commotion,
and sent forces to investigate.
Angelia: Understood.
Angelia: All in all, we should be safe for now. You two can——
Masked Girl: Let go of me!

Masked Girl: Who do you think you are? Dragging strangers around like that without a word... 
Do you have any common sense!?
Naya: Hey! We saved you back there——
Angelia: Naya, keep your voice low——
Kingdom Army: Suspects discovered! Take them back for questioning!
Naya: Damnit!
Sione: Stop right there!
Sione: Princess! Dear Naya! Are you guys alright?
Angelia: Sione!? Why are you here?
Sione: When colonel found out that you two were missing, he immediately guessed that princess was on her way to visit the Bayer family.
Sione: He tasked me with coming to your rescue as soon as possible.
Angelia: ... Oh, so we were found out after all...
Sione: Princess, when you get back to Sunshine Infantry, please prepare yourself for a serious lecturing from Colonel Levon.

Sione: I am here on Colonel Levon's direct orders! 
I will definitely bring the princess back to him without a scratch!
Kingdom Army: Tch! Take that little girl away for now!
Angelia: Wait!
Sione: Princess! Please focus on the bigger picture!
Angelia: ......
Alice: Wait a minute. Where are you taking me?
Alice: No! I don't want to! Deemo, save me!
Sione: Fellow soldiers, prepare to follow my command.
Sione: NOW!
Ralph: Your Majesty, regarding the actions of the religious group you asked me to track last time...
Ralph: Your Majesty, are you studying... sheet music?
Theodore: ... Not really, just a few pieces of old sheet music. The servants discovered these when they were cleaning the old site of the capitol.
Theodore: They probably got left behind by accident when the castle took flight.
Ralph: They are all yellow now... This sheet music... once belonged to your Majesty?
Theodore: Yes. When Angelia was little, I played these songs for her.

Ralph: I see. 
However, why are there so many wings drawn on these sheets...
Theodore: ... Because she always felt that my music had the ability to fly.
Theodore: ... So... the handwriting of that child has remained till this day...
Ralph: Your Majesty Theodore...

Messenger: Reporting to your Majesty Theodore. 
We captured a suspect wandering near our camp. The person she seemed to be acting alongside is none other than... traitor Angelia!
Theodore: ... Isn't this just a child? Are you certain that this is the right person?
Messenger: Absolutely. It appears that she also helped the princess destroy our magic circles. We should not underestimate her just because she's a child!
Theodore: If it's such a minor issue, handle it yourselves. Get general Fredrica...
Alice: So many wings... Ah, this is sheet music for the piano.

Theodore: ... How can you tell that this is for the piano?
It could be for any instrument.
Alice: Because there are wings.
Theodore: What?
Alice: The music from a piano can fly~ They can fly really~ high~ Every time I hear Deemo play the piano, I always feel like I'm flying.
Theodore: ......
Alice: ... Umm, did I say something bad...

Model.Text: Angel, the monsters don't seem to be chasing us!
So they are indeed attracted to that tree?

However, we must still be careful. Theodore's forces are stationed nearby. 
They may have already noticed the commotion,
and sent forces to investigate.
Understood.
All in all, we should be safe for now. You two can——
Let go of me!

Who do you think you are? Dragging strangers around like that without a word... 
Do you have any common sense!?
Hey! We saved you back there——
Naya, keep your voice low——
Suspects discovered! Take them back for questioning!
Damnit!
Stop right there!
Princess! Dear Naya! Are you guys alright?
Sione!? Why are you here?
When colonel found out that you two were missing, he immediately guessed that princess was on her way to visit the Bayer family.
He tasked me with coming to your rescue as soon as possible.
... Oh, so we were found out after all...
Princess, when you get back to Sunshine Infantry, please prepare yourself for a serious lecturing from Colonel Levon.

I am here on Colonel Levon's direct orders! 
I will definitely bring the princess back to him without a scratch!
Tch! Take that little girl away for now!
Wait!
Princess! Please focus on the bigger picture!
Wait a minute. Where are you taking me?
No! I don't want to! Deemo, save me!
Fellow soldiers, prepare to follow my command.
NOW!
Your Majesty, regarding the actions of the religious group you asked me to track last time...
Your Majesty, are you studying... sheet music?
... Not really, just a few pieces of old sheet music. The servants discovered these when they were cleaning the old site of the capitol.
They probably got left behind by accident when the castle took flight.
They are all yellow now... This sheet music... once belonged to your Majesty?
Yes. When Angelia was little, I played these songs for her.

I see. 
However, why are there so many wings drawn on these sheets...
... Because she always felt that my music had the ability to fly.
... So... the handwriting of that child has remained till this day...
Your Majesty Theodore...

Reporting to your Majesty Theodore. 
We captured a suspect wandering near our camp. The person she seemed to be acting alongside is none other than... traitor Angelia!
... Isn't this just a child? Are you certain that this is the right person?
Absolutely. It appears that she also helped the princess destroy our magic circles. We should not underestimate her just because she's a child!
If it's such a minor issue, handle it yourselves. Get general Fredrica...
So many wings... Ah, this is sheet music for the piano.

... How can you tell that this is for the piano?
It could be for any instrument.
Because there are wings.
What?
The music from a piano can fly~ They can fly really~ high~ Every time I hear Deemo play the piano, I always feel like I'm flying.
... Umm, did I say something bad...
